mapper.select: select c.*, u.name from comment c left join user u on c.com_u_id=u.id where c.com_a_id=#{com_a_id} and c.com_condition=0
select * from comment c where c.com_u_id=#{com_u_id} and c.com_condition=0
select * from comment c where c.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update comment c set c.com_condition=1 where id=#{id}
UPDATE comment set c_content=#{c_content}, c_post_date=sysdate() where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into comment(c_content, c_post_date, com_u_id, com_a_id) values(#{c_content}, sysdate(), #{com_u_id}, #{com_a_id})
